attributes.action: make it an offence for anyone to state that another person is a paedophile when this is not true
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: there are too many cases where people have been accused of being a paedophile just because someone takes a dislike to that person. if need be the victim should be able to get proof from a police force or a court to prove they are innocent. and that the fee for this should be paid for by the people that accused him/her. and make sure that the police investigates this horrible crime
